Posts.Content: williambohnet wrote: My wife was diagnosed with breast cancer june 07....stage 3... went thru chemo 9 treatments  - adriamison, paclataxiol, cytaxon ( i guess thts how its spelled ) followed by radation, herseption, arimedex, i guess in that order followed up with treatments of zometta / fisoldex, every thing seemed to be evaning out.....dec 08 cancer pops up in brain, hip and rib. gamma knife for the brain and started round 2 of chemo today  - 6 treatments over the next 18 weeks / carbo latin and herceptin again has anyboby had a good sucess rate with this regimine Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Looking For an Answer williambohnet LuAnnH

Posts.Content: williambohnet wrote: My wife just finished chemo 1 month ago ( Sept 09 ), this is the 2ed time in 2 years, roughly 3 to 4 weeks after chemo her scan showed a hot spot ( it was allready there ) on her hip that seemed to be growing......I thought chemo should have taken care of it....or at least slowed it down....when my wife recieved the scan results she said it was a good scan because it hasen't spread to any organs..... but I am concerned that 1 spot is getting larger so soon after chemo so now on to radation again, I asked her onc about trials but the way she put it was if we go to trials we cant do herception and aremidex ( or maybe I took it that way - because she said she wasn't giving up on her yet ) she was on herception and aremidex last year but it still spread to her brain and a couple spots on her bone.....I read on here and other places bone mets seem to be the easier to control.. rather than other organs....why do you think were having such a hard time and does anybody have any imput on any trials Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Getting Worn Down williambohnet MJLToday
